thread.title: Japan's Lawson convenience store group signs deal with Cxense
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Japan's Lawson convenience store group signs deal with Cxense | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Japan's Lawson convenience store group signs deal with Cxense
text:
Sept 28 Cxense ASA :
* Signs an agreement with Lawson Inc.
* The contract includes licensing of the entire Cxense platform consisting of Cxense Insight (real-time analytics), Cxense DMP (Data Management Platform), Cxense Content (recommendations) and Search, and Cxense Advertising Source text for Eikon:
 (Gdynia Newsroom)
